reference_data.title: GENEX (STS-87) 실험

summary.eng: In ISS, the root growth characteristics of the soybean tomb (initial plant) — the root length change observation.

reference_data.title: NASA Veggie 시스템 (ISS)

summary.kor: 상추, 케일 등 잎채소가 ISS에서 재배된 사례 있음. 우주에서 직접 먹은 기록도 있음.
summary.eng: Leaf vegetables such as lettuce and kale have been grown in ISS. There are also records that were eaten directly in space.

reference_data.title: ISS 다양한 실험 (lettuce, mustard, bok choy 등)

summary.kor: 잎채소 작물 여러 종류가 ISS 내에서 테스트되어 재배 가능성 확인됨.
summary.eng: Several types of leafy vegetable crops are tested within ISS to confirm the possibility of cultivation.

reference_data.title: Advanced Astroculture experiments

summary.kor: 우주에서 1세대 → 2세대로 이어지는 식물 재배 실험 존재 보고됨 (콩 실험 내 일부 기록)
summary.eng: It has been reported to be a plant cultivation experiment that leads from space to first generation → 2nd generation (some records within the bean experiment)

reference_data.title: TROPI 실험 (Arabidopsis)

summary.kor: ISS에서 Arabidopsis (작은 모델 식물)를 사용해 빛 조건과 중력 조합 하에서 뿌리/식물 반응 실험됨.
summary.eng: In ISS, Arabidopsis (small model plant) is used to test root/plant reaction under light conditions and gravity combination.

reference_data.title: NASA 기사 “NASA Plant Researchers Explore Deep-Space Food Crops”

summary.kor: 케일, 상추, 감자, 콩류을 우주 및 극한 환경 식재 후보로 연구 중임. 감자도 지상 시험에서 우주 조건 모사 환경 하에서 연구됨.
summary.eng: Kale, lettuce, potatoes, and beans are being studied as a candidate for planting space and extreme environment. Potatoes are also studied under the space conditions of the space conditions.

reference_data.title: Inkspot 변종 토마토 (외계 재배 조건 모사)

summary.eng: Stress resistance variant tomato experiments under the moon/Mars soil -like environment - exploration of the possibility of space application.

reference_data.title: Development and growth of potato tubers in microgravity

reference_data.title: Structure of potato tubers formed during spaceflight

summary.kor: 우주에서 형성된 감자 조직이 지상과 구조상 유사함.
summary.eng: Potato tissues formed in space are similar in terms of ground with ground.

reference_data.title: Microbiological and Nutritional Analysis of Lettuce Crops Grown in Space

summary.kor: ISS Veggie 시스템에서 상추를 재배, 영양소 및 미생물 특성 분석됨.

reference_data.title: Pick-and-Eat Space Crop Production Flight Testing on the ISS

summary.eng: ESA Melissa is designing a mud crop like potatoes/sweet potatoes under the ESA Melissa plan.

summary.eng: Autonomous cultivation system experiment, plant cultivation environment module on track.

reference_data.title: Microgravity research in plants (리뷰)

summary.eng: In the micro -gravity conditions, various crops, genetic expression reactions, and cultivation can be analyzed.
